name: Amishion Impossible
overview: An entry into the itch.io 2018 Seven Day First Person Shooter Jam, coded entirely between the 20th and 27th of October. The game is set in a fictional 2004,four years after the horrific events of Y2K, where appliances rule the world and only those who shunned them are free from their tyranny. Eventually, the mechano men come for your farm on the edge of Philadelphia. Use your goodly shotgun and your pitchfork to take out the tech terrors, mayhaps you'll find more weapons along the way.
